messages.messageBody:
oh ug, I thought 7 was supposed to be more pleasant than 6 has been. Patty

*****

Oh, your son is about 7? That can sometimes be a downer of a hormonal age.

Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dethroned
messages.msgSnippet: **There is a good age difference (5+ years) between my two kids and I am sensitive to te fact Matthew may feel usurped by his sister, not only because she s
messages.messageBody:
**There is a good age difference (5+ years) between my two kids and I am
sensitive to te fact Matthew may feel usurped by his sister, not only
because she's here but also because she is a pretty vocal and demanding
child. **

Oh, your son is about 7? That can sometimes be a downer of a hormonal age.

Betsy

PS I think I missed your very first post, somehow. Did you want to
homeschool or was it thrust upon you through school problems or
something else?
